Guangshan county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

sentences.english: On their way to the campground, they enjoyed looking at the beautiful mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 往露營地的一路上，他們飽覽了秀麗的湖光山色。

sentences.english: Each other and the beauty of 56 historic sites humanities.
sentences.chinese: 與湖光山色交相輝映的有56處人文歷史古蹟。

sentences.english: It is large city and very pretty. Scenery amid the misty rain looks very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這是個很大的城市，湖光山色在濛濛細雨中特別美麗。

sentences.english: Meets my lake and mountain scenery complementing each other.
The village is known for its beautiful mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子以其美麗的湖光山色而出名。

sentences.english: As we were looking at the mountains all around us, she playfully pushed me off the side into the water.
sentences.chinese: 當我們正在欣賞湖光山色時，她淘氣地把我推進湖裏。
